text: Celebrating yesterday's verdict in the #DerekChauvinTrial (& #justice for #GeorgeFloyd) & my second dose of #COVID19 #vaccine w/ a partial wander around snowy (?) downtown #ROC. Felt appropriate to pay my respects to #JohnLewis (#IAmSpeaking) & #FrederickDouglass. It's a start! https://t.co/jaf9Luk4jh
